meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4015.

td.p: Andrew Sims, a high school social studies teacher from Laguna Niguel, California
Anne Takemoto, a consultant from Marina del Rey, California
Susan Robbins, a training and development professional from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,601)

tr.td: THAT'S A PAULING
COLLEGE SPORTS
MASS COMMUNICATION
THE NEAREST U.S. EMBASSY
(Alex: Tell us what city it's in.)
RAINY DAY GAMES
BRIEFLY

high school diploma

Anne
Triple Stumper
')

Susan
